get.description: List all time entries of all users, sorted by date_at. Time trackers can only access their own entries.
Get all time entries of the authenticated user for the current date

patch.description: Update the service with the given attributes

get.description: Returns the time tracker for the authenticated user

patch.description: Update the project with the given attributes

get.description: Lists all bookmarks, sorted by name.

post.description: Create a new service. All attributes are optional, except the name.

delete.description: Stops the time tracker on the time entry with the given id and returns its last state.

patch.description: Start the tracker for the time entry given by the id
Update a time entry with the given attributes. Only administrators can update entries of other users; all others only their own.
